explains: n. 壮丽，壮观；美景，让人印象深刻的事物（splendors）

sentences.en: I will enjoy to the full all my splendor!
sentences.cn: 我要尽情享受我所有的辉煌！

sentences.en: The splendor of it was beyond all imagination!
sentences.cn: 它的辉煌是超乎想象的！

sentences.en: The author tried to depict the splendor of the sunset.
sentences.cn: 作家试图摹写落日的光彩。
